title: Remove authentication and make all backend functions publicly accessible

requirements.text: Remove all Internet Identity authentication from the frontend application
acceptanceCriteria: Internet Identity login UI is completely removed
No authentication provider wraps the application
Users can access all features without any login prompts

requirements.text: Remove all caller verification checks from backend canister methods to make them publicly accessible

quotes: all should be made publicly accessible

acceptanceCriteria: All backend functions can be called without authentication
No Principal.isAnonymous() or caller identity checks remain
All methods are accessible to anonymous callers

requirements.text: Display image upload and GIF picker inline in the message input area rather than in a dropdown menu

quotes: the image upload and gif picker must be inline

acceptanceCriteria: Image upload button is visible directly in the message input area
GIF picker button is visible directly in the message input area
No paperclip dropdown menu or modal is required to access these features
Both options are always visible and accessible to users

constraints: Maintain existing message display functionality with inline images and GIFs
Keep all existing backend data structures and storage mechanisms intact
nonGoals: Implementing user tracking or session management
Changing the visual design or styling beyond inline button placement
